About Me

Economist & Author

Over Mij

Econoom & Auteur

  • Graduated in Business Economics, specializing in International Business & Control.
  • Graduated as Teacher in Economics, 2nd degree.
  • More than 15 years active in Finance, CRM and Business Intelligence.
  • Author of the book: "All things you need to know about Bitcoin & other Crypto" in Dutch and English
  • Afgestudeerd in Bedrijfseconomie, richting International Business & Control
  • Afgestudeerd Docent Economie 2e graads
  • Meer dan 15 jaar actief in Finance, CRM en Business Intelligence.
  • Auteur van het boek: "All things you need to know about Bitcoin & other Crypto" in Nederlands en Engels
